trans-unit.source: Maintains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> objects by name.
trans-unit.target: Mantiene una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> por nombre.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> que se va a agregar a la colección.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object to the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> object.
The configuration provider in <paramref name="builder" /> must implement the class <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: El proveedor de configuración de <paramref name="builder" /> debe implementar la clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object from the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> that is configured with the provided name.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> de <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> que está configurado con el nombre proporcionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object that is configured with the provided <paramref name="name" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> que se configura con el elemento <paramref name="name" /> proporcionado.
